subject: Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
organizations: New York State Racing and Wagering Board
lead_paragraph: New York toughened its steroids policy for racehorses, following the lead of the two other states that hold Triple Crown races. The New York State Racing and Wagering Board said the new rules would take effect Jan. 1 at all thoroughbred and standardbred tracks in the state.
